chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (3 or more 1st degree acts)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Jay XIONG was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Child Enticement-Sexual Contact, a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.07(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain fulltime employment, schooling or a combination of both at the agent's discretion.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Comply with Sex Offender treatment.

Register with and comply with the Sex Offender Registry for fifteen (15) years after the period of probation is completed.

No contact with children unless approved by the agent.

No possession or use of internet enabled devices without agent's approval.

Provide DNA sample.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jay XIONG

records.addlTxt:
Settlement Conference Summary.
Plea hearing is set for 03-08-2016 at 9:30 a.m., Br. 2.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is reset to 01-19-16 at 2:00 p.m.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 12-08-15 at 2:15 p.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 11-10-15 at 1:30 p.m.   Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours and defendant is to have no contact with N.X. or anyone under the age of 18.  Bail furnished.    
Minutes.
